Why do I keep coming back to this game? 

Aside from the hackers, this is the most competitive game I own. I wouldnt even describe winning a competitive match as enjoyable, more a relief that we've managed to get over the line again. 

This is an essential game to have in your Steam library.

After some low ranks the community starts to get better... overall the game is amazing in my opinion. since the first counterstrike the game has always been entertaining and it is getting better with every update. Now it is in a very good position quality and price wise. Consider buying prime to avoid hackers ruining your game.
